*Foreign Currency Translation Reserve represents the exchange differences arising on translation of the financial statements of non-integral foreign operations.
These differences are accumulated in this reserve and are recognized directly in equity under “Reserves and Surplus”.

The reserve will be reclassified to the Statement of Profit and Loss upon the disposal or closure of the respective foreign operation in accordance with AS-11 – The Effects of Changes in Foreign Exchange Rates.
